articles.title: US Techies Claim IT Firm Gave Their Jobs To Indians On H1-B Visas: Report - NDTV
articles.description: A group of American professionals has levelled serious allegations against Indian tech giant Tata Consultancy (TCS) in the latest twist to the ongoing debate over the US visa program for skilled foreign workers.
